text: Huni Valley Senior High School () is a coeducational second-cycle institution in Huni Valley in the Western Region of Ghana. ==History== The school was established in 1975. ==See also== * Education in Ghana * List of senior high schools in Ghana ==References== Category:1975 establishments in Ghana Category:Educational institutions established in 1975 Category:High schools in Ghana Category:Education in the Western Region (Ghana)
title: Huni Valley Senior High School
